articles.author: Ivan Garcia-Hidalgo, Opinion Contributor
articles.title: The myth about Puerto Rican statehood that won't go away
articles.description: Let's instead look at Puerto Rican statehood as an opportunity to grow our conservative movement. And in the process, we can support federalism, democratic government and self-governance.
articles.content:
This week marks the 103-year anniversary of the enactment of the Jones-Shafroth Act - a law providing Puerto Ricans U.S. citizenship.
In practice this means that 3.4 million of our fellow citizens have been denied a democratic form of government for more tha… [+5238 chars]

articles.author: Emily Birnbaum
articles.title: Lawmakers reprimand top DOJ antitrust official for giving 'lobbying advice' about T-Mobile-Sprint merger
articles.description: A group of House and Senate Democrats on Friday reprimanded the Department of Justice's (DOJ) top antitrust enforcer for giving "lobbying advice" to a private company ahead of the contentious T-Mobile-Sprint merger....
articles.content:
A group of House and Senate Democrats on Friday reprimanded the Department of Justice's (DOJ) top antitrust enforcer for giving "lobbying advice" to a private company ahead of the contentious T-Mobile-Sprint merger.
